sign_in.title: Sign In
sign_in.description: Sign in to Tabber via email or social media

sign_out.title: Sign Out
sign_out.description: You have been signed out from Tabber

error.title: Error
error.description: Something went wrong while signing in

verify_request.title: Check your email
verify_request.description: A sign in link has been sent to your email address

sign_out.title: You have been signed out
description: You can still use Tabber, but your data will not be backed up and synchronized across devices.
To enable cloud sync, please sign in again.

error.title: Something went wrong
description: Please try to sign in again.
You can also try to sign in using a different method.
If the problem persists, feel free to contact us.

verify_request.title: Check your email
description: A sign in link has been sent to your email address.
